reviewText: Very smooth and creepy, with solid acting all around. A dark film in every way with a haunting beautiful sound track featuring a song that really must be redone with modern sound recording, "Ni deng zhe huei lai" [...]. Unfortunately neither the movie or the song is available in a good format.

Ok, the first time I saw this movie I was really scared. This is a ghost story that is suspenseful and disturbing to say the least. The director was able to bring out great performances from all the actors/actresses. A definite thumbs up for someone who likes scary movies.
